description:
Whether It's Your Monthly, Weekly, Or Instant Shopping Needs, You Just Have To Use KWIK!
-Skip The Traffic
-Skip the Bad Weather
-Skip The Heat
-Skip The Stress
-Skip Waiting In Market Queues 
-Receive Your Needs At Your Door Step

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

developer: iFood Agencia de servicos de restaurantes LTDA
description:
Compre em mercados, restaurantes, farmácias e pet shop de forma fácil e rápida, tudo a um toque de você. As ofertas dos melhores mercados e restaurantes da sua cidade estão no IFood. Aqui você também encontra produtos para seu pet além de comprar itens de farmácia.

Pensou em pedir comida? Peça no IFood! Ir ao mercado, farmácia ou pet shop? Esquece, vai de IFood!

Delivery de Restaurantes
Não importa se você quer comer sushi, comida vegetariana, hambúrguer, pizza ou experimentar um restaurante novo. Use o iFood e peça em vários restaurantes no melhor app de delivery de comida para sua fome e seu bolso, sem precisar esperar uma Black Friday

Delivery de Mercado
Bateu aquela vontade de preparar sua comida em casa ou faltou algum item da compra do mês? Você pode aproveitar nosso delivery de mercado para comprar os ingredientes que faltam e receber na sua casa!

Delivery de Bebidas
Que tal umas bebidas pra curtir com os amigos no fim de semana? Com o iFood você recebe as bebidas em casa e ainda economiza com cupons de desconto e ofertas.

Delivery de Farmácia
Precisa comprar remédios, fraldas, produtos de higiene, produtos de beleza ou algum outro item de farmácia? É só pedir pelo iFood! Compre remédios, produtos de beleza e outros itens de farmácia com cupons de oferta e descontos disponíveis nas farmácias mais perto de você.

Delivery de Pet Shop
Acabou a ração do seu pet? Precisa de areia pra sua gatinha? Não tem problema! Com o iFood você pode pedir ração, areia de gato, remédios veterinários e outros itens de pet com cupons de desconto e ofertas nos pet shops perto da sua casa.

Cupons e descontos pra vc
Com o iFood você sempre tem opção de mercado, restaurante, farmácia e pet shop pra comprar com qualidade gastando pouco sempre, não só na Black Friday. Confira os vários cupons disponíveis pra você e aproveite os descontos em restaurantes, supermercados, farmácia e pet shop com entrega grátis pra pedir a qualquer hora do dia.

Milhares de opções baratinhas
Use nossa busca ou navegue pelas categorias e listas especiais pra encontrar as ofertas de comida nos melhores restaurantes, promoções de bebida, pizzaria, farmácia, pet shop ou compra de mercado. Depois, é só colocar na sacola e fechar seu pedido online. Em pouco tempo, o entregador estará na sua porta com tudo o que pediu do restaurante ou supermercado.

Acompanhe seu pedido
No iFood você recebe sua entrega de comida e mercado rapidinho e ainda pode acompanhar as etapas de preparação do pedido e entrega pelo app. Aproveite para fazer suas compras de mercado, experimentar um restaurante novo ou agendar sua comida e receber em casa.

Baixe o app de delivery que traz para pertinho de você os seus pratos favoritos, ou se decidir cozinhar, você encontra todos os ingredientes de sua receita em alguns poucos toques em supermercados. Com nosso delivery, você pede pratos dos melhores restaurantes, supermercados, farmácias e pet shop!

Tá esperando o que pra baixar nosso app de delivery de comida, mercado, farmácia e pet shop? Tenha os melhores supermercados e restaurantes, aquela pizzaria do bairro ou o mercado em que você sempre compra a apenas alguns cliques de distância. Aproveite para fazer seu pedido de comida e bebida e pedir sua entrega onde estiver. Tenha pizza, hambúrguer, comida vegetariana, sushi, fast food, comida italiana e muitos outros pratos do seu restaurante ou supermercado favorito na sua casa.

Veja a lista completa das cidades onde tem entrega do iFood. Peça agora seu delivery de comida e mercado online: https://www.ifood.com.br/cidades-atendidas

app_name: 飢餓黑熊 - 最豐富的美食資訊與優惠
description:
找不到吃的嗎？

飢餓黑熊 整理超過 200,000 間餐廳，合計 200 種以上食物類型，收錄各品牌優惠券 (Klook, Gomaji, 券券) 及串連外送平台 (Foodpanda, UberEats)。
還有網友協助整理的知名網紅推薦餐廳，配合篩選功能，可以設定預算甚至距離，只有你想不到的沒有你找不到的！

隨時在煩惱下一餐要吃什麼

可以試試看骰骰子以及探索世界，推薦附近熱度較高的餐廳，加入想吃清單或是即刻前往！

飢餓黑熊的獨特之處

使用 Facebook 登入時，會提供你正在使用 App 的好友清單，可以追蹤彼此，看看對方最近想去的咖啡廳、最推薦的的無煙燒烤。

我們致力於為用戶們打造最理想的使用體驗

若是有任何想法及建議，歡迎至飢餓黑熊粉絲專頁，與我們分享
https://www.facebook.com/ihungrybear

App 也有提供集點數系統，商家請來此聯絡
https://ihungrybear.com/links/restaurant-owner/

我們也有特別刊錄專業的美食評論，創作者們請來此聯絡
https://ihungrybear.com/links/kol-form/

developer: Beijing Mantou Enterprise Management Center (Limited Partnership)
description:
BeU offers a great selection of your favorite restaurants and shops and a fast door-to-door delivery that allows you to have your favorite food just a few taps away and enjoy them from the comfort of your home or office. Order food with us and Get restaurant deals and discounts including free delivery on your first order. 

BeU also offers a one-step connection for you to directly make inquiries to the shops and restaurants, read online reviews, browse photos and menus, order from your favorite restaurants, find all important information for places you’re looking for,  discover new foods, hot offers, and places for shopping. Whatever you’re looking for, a new pizzeria, pops ice, or a new bakery shop, we have got you covered. We will help you choose the best place with our review and rating system. All perfect places to eat and, drink, relax and play in one app.


What BeU offers:

BeU offers a great selection of your local restaurants and shops
Simple and Fast delivery with options such as scheduled delivery 
Convenient payment methods such as cash on delivery and other options
Sort the best restaurants by reviews and rating to find the best of the best
Tailored customer services experience to each client, our customer services can confirm and place an order for you


About BeU:

BeU is a product by XMT that connects people to what is best in their cities. Taking all the convenience of finding what you need to your hands in a simple and user-friendly manner with the best deals and services all one click away from you. BeU also empowers small local businesses to increase their reach and find new creative ways to connect them to the clients.

Best Indian Restaurant in Llandudno, LL30 Serving Gogarth, Llanrhos, Penrhyn-side, Glanwydden, Penrhyn Bay, Deganwy & Bryn Pydew


App Features:
- Restaurant Menu
- Order Online
- Reserve table 
- Last orders
- Flexible payment system
- Keep up-to-date with our special offers and promotions 
- Easily telephone the restaurant from your mobile

TheFork is Europe’s leading restaurant booking platform, proudly bringing people together through unique and affordable culinary experiences since 2007. What are you waiting for? Activate your location and we’ll activate your taste buds! You set the tone, we set the table.

TheFork continues to be savoured across the biggest foodie hotspots in France, Spain, Italy, the UK, the Netherlands, Belgium, Switzerland, Portugal, Denmark, and Sweden. But wait, what exactly do we bring to the table? Here are 6 reasons to download TheFork app right now.

1. Things that tickle our taste buds: fast, free and easy online booking
We know that normal life means having a lot on your plate, so to make things a bit easier for you, we've simplified restaurant booking. With a few simple taps on our mobile app, you’ll be one step closer to having that ‘mmm’ moment of pure belly satisfaction, in the most seamless way possible.

2. Frugal on prices, never on flavours
Our amazing restaurant partners love their diners as much as we love ours and offer exclusive discounts on reservations throughout the year (automatically applied and subject to conditions at the time of booking). That way restaurants get to open their doors to all types of diners, making dining out accessible to everyone.

3. Community insights = better bites
Tuck into the wisdom of our gourmet community! With over 20 million trusted reviews from only customers who have actually tried the restaurant—your palette is in good hands!

4. We don’t skimp on choice
Reserved? Not us. That’s just a label for a table. So whether you’re looking for the perfect spot for bottomless brunching, taco crunching or al-fresco munching, our foodies are spoiled for choice with our diverse collection of over 60,000 restaurants and 40,000 photos, menus and community reviews that will satisfy just about any culinary mood and occasion. After all, variety is the spice of life! Browse, scroll and add to favourites, so you can find more of what you love. Now that’s food for thought.

5. We take loyalty VERY seriously
To reward our awesome foodie community, every booking with TheFork accumulates unique Yums points, which can be redeemed in the form of a tasty discount at one of our many partner restaurants down the line. Here’s how it works:

1 reservation = 100 Yums (Y)

Once you've accumulated enough you can enjoy amazing offers which converts to: 
1000 Yums = £20 loyalty discount!
2000 Yums = £50 loyalty discount!

Keep an eye out for Double Yums and other ways to earn more Yums as you book.

We love hearing from our TheFork foodie community! Reach out at contact@thefork.com.

>In the UK, follow us on:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheFork.uk/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thefork_uk/?hl=en

CIBOUSCAN: Scan Your BEAUTY & FOOD Products – Health Score, Nutri-Score, NOVA and Recipes

CIBOUSCAN is the must-have app to take care of your health, your skin and the planet.
Scan your beauty products and groceries in seconds to see their full ingredients, health score, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, and find better alternatives that suit you.

Beauty: your bathroom under control
	•	Scan your cosmetics (skincare, body care, hair care, makeup, perfume).
	•	Get a complete health score for each product: ingredients list, controversial additives, potential impact on your health.
	•	Check the compatibility with your skin type, specific needs or allergies.
	•	Read real user reviews to choose wisely before buying.
	•	Create your personalized beauty routine and get a routine score to track and improve your habits every day.

Food: scan, decode, cook
	•	Scan your food products to see their Nutri-Score, NOVA, and any additives.
	•	Discover personalized recipes based on your food preferences, favorite or blacklisted products, allergies, diet and the season.
	•	Easily view your scan history to track your consumption over time.
	•	Get smart flexitarian recommendations designed to reduce your environmental impact while eating deliciously.

Practical, complete and privacy-friendly
	•	No account required: use all features completely anonymously.
	•	Works with and syncs automatically to the CIBOULETTE app if you already have it.
	•	One smart assistant for your beauty choices, grocery shopping, Nutri-Score and NOVA – all in one app.

Why choose CIBOUSCAN?
	•	One app to scan both BEAUTY and FOOD products.
	•	Access to health scores, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, skin compatibility.
	•	Real user reviews to help you compare and decide.
	•	Personalized recipes for healthy eating without frustration.
	•	A flexible and kind approach: better choices without forbidding what you love.
	•	Everything is anonymous, practical and made for you.

Download CIBOUSCAN now and join the CIBOULETTE team to shop smarter, eat better and take care of yourself and the planet.

** CibouScan is not affiliated with any other apps

Try Premium:

Upgrade to Premium for an ad-free experience. Subscriptions are billed to your Apple account and auto-renew unless turned off in App Store settings. Any unused portion of the free trial is forfeited upon purchase of a subscription.

- PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION -

Premium gives access to all the features of the application!

The subscription will be billed in a single payment. Payment is made through iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
The subscription will renew automatically within 24 hours before the end of the subscription. Your account will be debited 24 hours before your existing subscription ends, at the same price you paid the first time.
You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal by receiving you in your account settings after purchase.
If you pay for your subscription before the trial period expires, the remaining free trial period will be forfeited.

CGU / CGV: https://weblogit.co.uk/cgu.html
Privacy: https://weblogit.co.uk/privacy.html



We keep in touch ?
- Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/ciboulette.app/
- Site : https://ciboulette.app/
- Mail : henri@ciboulette.app - lisa@ciboulette.app

Whether you’re chasing dreams, running meetings, or taking a break — Zomato is built for the ones who don’t slow down. Craving biryani between brainstorms? A cheesy burger after a long day? Or just a salad and chai to keep things steady? With lightning-fast delivery from over 3 lakh restaurants, your fuel is never far. Order in seconds, track every bite, and keep going. Hustle harder – we’ve got the food.

▪ Search and Discover Top Restaurants and Dishes
From butter chicken to sushi, dal makhani to dimsums – and legends like Domino’s, Pizza Hut, McDonald’s, Starbucks, and more – Zomato puts your cravings on speed dial. Just decisions, made easy.

▪ Access Restaurant Details
 Menus, ratings, reviews, photos – everything you need to decide fast and eat faster. Rate your meal to guide the next hungry hustler.

▪ Try Veg Mode
Veg Mode curates top vegetarian dishes, veg-only restaurants, and even veg-only delivery fleets. Clean eating with no compromise.

▪ Schedule Your Orders
 Time is currency. Lock in your lunch or dinner before the hunger hits. The scheduling feature lets you plan ahead and stay on track.

▪ Food on Train
 Even when you’re on the move, Zomato keeps up. Enter your PNR, pick your dish, and get your meal delivered to your seat at 130+ stations. No chaos, no compromises –  just food (and your schedule) right on track.

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

Receitas Fáceis e Deliciosas  é uma aplicação que se dedica exclusivamente em trazer para a sua vida um conjunto de receitas que lhe vai ajudar a melhorar a sua vida culinária. Temos varias categorias disponíveis na aplicação , em que lhe garante variedade nas suas refeições. 
Todos os dias  a nossa equipa dedica-se em encontrar novas e inovadoras receitas para que os nossos utilizadores tenham uma dieta cheia de variedade e balanço nas suas vidas.

Aquela Receita é um app que reúne gastronomia à simplicidade, com o intuito de levar ao público através de nossas receitas uma forma mais prática, fácil e gostosa de cozinhar, ilustradas por vídeos e produção fotográfica.

Política de privacidade: https://aquelareceita.com.br/politica-de-privacidade/
Termos de uso EULA: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

McDonald's Official App for Japan
The McDonald's official app offers not only daily coupons and latest information but also allows you to complete your order and payment seamlessly.



Features Available:
• Access to the Latest Coupons
Enjoy exclusive coupons that can be used in-store or through mobile orders. Show the coupon number to the staff by selecting "Use in Store" or choose a coupon from the mobile order menu category.
• Check McDonald’s Menu
Access detailed information about McDonald's products, including ingredients, allergy information, and nutritional content.
• Discover the Latest News
Find recommended news and products tailored to you right on the home screen.
• Order and pay via the App with Mobile Order
You can complete your order and payment entirely through the app. Skip the line and receive your food directly at your table (not available in certain restaurants or hours).
• Order from home and have your meal delivered by McDelivery® Service via the App.



How to Use Mobile Order:
Step 1: Log In
To use coupons or place an order, you need to register and log in. If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it via the "Forgot Password" option. Please ensure that you can receive emails from info@nsp.mdj.jp.
Step 2: Choose a Restaurant
Select the restaurant where you would like to receive your order. Please check the available restaurants in the app.
Step 3: Select Your Menu
Choose your favorite menu items. Coupons can also be used. Please note that some coupons available for mobile orders may differ from those available at the Front Counter.
Step 4: Choose Your Pickup Method
Select from table delivery (table service), counter pickup, takeout, park & go, or Drive-Thru. Pickup options may vary by restaurant and time. Table service, park & go, and drive-thru are not available at all locations.
Step 5: Choose Your Payment Method
You can pay with a credit card (VISA, Master, JCB, Diners, American Express), d-Barai, PayPay, Rakuten Pay, au PAY, LINE Pay, or Apple Pay .
Please Complete the Following Step After Arriving at the Restaurant
Step 6: Receive Your Order
Once you arrive at the restaurant, confirm your payment to start the preparation of your order. Enjoy your freshly prepared food.



How to Use McDelivery® Service:
Step 1: Log In
To place an order, you need to register and log in. If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it via the "Forgot Password" option. Please ensure that you can receive emails from info@nsp.mdj.jp.
Step 2: Select Delivery Address and Time
Choose whether you want to order now or reserve a delivery time. Reservations can be made from one day to two hours prior to the desired delivery time.
Step 3: Select Your Menu
Choose your favorite menu items.
Step 4: Choose Your Payment Method
You can pay with cash, credit card (VISA, Master, JCB, Diners, American Express), d-barai, PayPay, Rakuten Pay, au PAY, LINE Pay, or Apple Pay . Please note that cash payments are not available at some locations.
Step 5: Receive Your Order
Our delivery staff will bring your freshly prepared meal to your specified address. If you prefer a no-contact delivery, you can select the "Leave at the Door" option when ordering.
• Please note:
  • Delivery times vary by location.
  • Orders for the breakfast menu must be placed by 10:20 AM.
  • Minimum order value is ¥1,500 (¥1,000 for breakfast).
  • A delivery fee of ¥300 applies.

Order meals and snacks from your favourite local and national restaurants, or get groceries, essentials and alcohol delivered to your door.
New users get 30% off your first 3 orders. T&C apply: New users only. Expires 30 days from new user’s first DoorDash order. Valid at participating stores only. 1 redemption per user for each category; national chain, local and grocery (3 in total). Max $20 discount per order. Fees apply.
YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS
Explore a wide variety of cuisines and get your meals faster with quick and easy ordering. From your local noodle place to your daily coffee fix to your go-to comfort food, find your favourites on DoorDash. National partners include McDonald's, Pizza Hut, Hungry Jack's, Subway, Domino's, KFC, Subway, Taco Bell, Nando's, Oporto, Grill'd, Sushi Sushi, Zambrero and more.
GROCERIES AND CONVENIENCE
Order from your local Coles, IGA or 7-Eleven and have thousands of items delivered when you need them. Top up the pantry, grab last-minute ingredients, stock up on snacks to share with mates or cool down with a slurpee. Get your groceries and everyday essentials delivered with DoorDash.
SUBSCRIBE TO DASHPASS AND SAVE
With a DashPass subscription, enjoy unlimited deliveries and pay $0 delivery fees at DashPass merchants (min. spend applies), plus get access to special offers from local restaurants.
DELIVERY OR PICKUP?
Get what you need straight to your door, schedule delivery for when it's most convenient for you, or order ahead with pickup for a fast and easy takeaway.
NO-CONTACT DELIVERY
Deliveries are left at your door, unless you choose "Hand it to me" when ordering. For contactless deliveries, your Dasher will leave your food in a safe place and let you know it's ready.
TRACK YOUR ORDER
Real-time tracking lets you see when your order will arrive. We've factored in food prep and handling times, traffic, weather and more so you'll know exactly when to set the table.
CONVENIENT PAYMENT
Pay with Apple Pay, credit or debit card, PayPal or Afterpay.
ABOUT DOORDASH
DoorDash is a technology company that connects people with the best in their cities. Since 2013, we've been building products and services to empower local businesses and in turn, generate new ways for people to earn, work and live.

KFC Ísland
Nú er komin enn betri leið til að uppfylla KFC löngun þína með nýja KFC Iceland appinu. Appið okkar snýst um þægindi og gerir þér kleift að velja hvað þú vilt borða áður en þú ferð í verslanir okkar. Skráðu pöntunina einfaldlega í appið og veldu hvenær þú vilt fá hana afgreidda eftir að þú hefur greitt hana. Þegar þú velur að setja pöntunina í vinnslu þá er hún send beint í eldhúsið. Svo er bara að njóta.

Discover a smoother, more intuitive way to satisfy your KFC cravings with the redesigned KFC Iceland app. Our app is all about convenience, letting you decide what you want to eat before you even enter our stores. Simply place your order through the app and receive a QR code. Upon arrival, scan this code at our in-store machines to bypass the queue. Your order will be sent directly to the kitchen, so all that's left is to anticipate the delicious meal headed your way.

O que as pessoas estão falando do BLW Brasil:

Isabelle Déa

“Estou amando o app! Mostra a oferta de alimentos tanto em pedaços como amassadinhos, formas de preparo, etc. Ajuda muito, principalmente nós mães de primeira viagem”

Iana Clara Amoras 
“Aplicativo excelente! Sem dúvida a melhor aquisição para o processo de Introdução Alimentar! Todo conteúdo é maravilhoso e muito fácil de entender, além das dicas de receitas e como lidar com cada fase da IA! Ajuda muito os pais a lidarem com o medo de oferecer os alimentos! Por aqui, amamos! Parabéns a toda equipe por esse app maravilhoso!”

MayMoPeu 
Melhor app de Introdução alimentar
“Esse app é incrível e completo. Me sinto totalmente segura, informada e preparada através do conteúdo disponibilizado no aplicativo. Tem receitas, cardápios, artigos sobre os mais diversos assuntos em torno da IA. Queria um app tão completo pra alimentação de adultos. :D Melhor investimento que fiz! Nota 1000!”

—

Não esqueça de seguir a gente no Instagram @BlwBrasilApp 

—

Essa é a sua chance de virar especialista na alimentação do seu bebê. Este aplicativo foi feito para ajudar pais, pediatras e nutricionistas a se apoiarem sobre como fazer a introdução alimentar dos bebês acima dos 6 meses por meio da abordagem BLW (Baby-led Weaning) ou também oferecendo alimentos amassados, sempre respeitando a autonomia e desenvolvimento do bebê. 

Somos um time de mais de 20 mulheres empenhadas a trazer tudo que há de mais atual no universo da nutrição infantil. Pediatras, nutricionistas materno-infantis, fonoaudióloga, e outros profissionais de saúde.

Nosso aplicativo é totalmente livre de anúncios e venda de produtos aleatórios. Baixe gratuitamente!

Nele você vai encontrar um guia super completo, além de mais de 650 receitas, cardápios feitos por nutricionistas e muito mais. 

- Temos receitas para café da manhã, almoço, lanche e jantar. Você pode filtrar as receitas de acordo com alergias, preferências, tempo de preparo, complexidade e ingredientes. Poderá também salvar as suas receitas favoritas e organizá-las em pastas!
- A seção de alimentos, totalmente gratuita, vai te ensinar como oferecer cada alimento para seu bebê. Modo de preparo e apresentação para cada fase da introdução alimentar, com fotos e vídeos.
- Com nossos cardápios você saberá exatamente o que oferecer ao bebê, gradativamente, mês a mês. Temos opções para crianças veganas e vegetarianas e também cardápio de lancheirinhas. Tudo feito pelo nosso time de nutricionistas. 
- Guias nutricionais e específicos abordam temas importantes como gag e engasgo, amamentação durante a Introdução Alimentar, como começar, seletividade alimentar, entre outros. Além de guias sobre como higienizar alimentos, praticidade na cozinha e como congelar.

Como funciona o BLW Brasil:

Versão gratuita: acesso a toda seção de alimentos, cardápio de lancheirinha, diversos guias nutricionais e quizzes.

Versão premium: acesse +650 receitas, cardápios para cada fase do bebê, checklist de alimentos e acesso completo a todos os guias. Disponível nos planos mensal e anual, com possibilidade de teste grátis.

Sua assinatura renova automaticamente, mas você pode cancelar a qualquer momento, em dois cliques. A loja de aplicativos envia um email de confirmação da compra. É possível desativar a renovação automática nas definições de assinatura após a compra. Todas as informações sobre cobrança estão detalhadas no próprio app e na loja.

Baixe agora e experimente grátis!

Este aplicativo foi criado para pessoas que falam português. Se você mora em um país onde o idioma é o inglês e deseja receitas e cardápios dessa cultura, baixe nosso app BLW Meals. Ou se o idioma for espanhol, baixe o nosso app BLW Ideas.

Se tiver alguma dúvida contate-nos através do e-mail oi@blwbrasilapp.com.br, teremos o maior prazer em ajudar. :)

developer: YEMEK SEPETI ELEKTRONIK ILETISIM PERAKENDE GIDA LOJISTIK ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Yemeksepeti is with you, whatever you have in mind is at your door!

Since 2001, as Yemeksepeti, we are the first brand that comes to mind when it comes to online food ordering, with our business partners and more than 50 thousand restaurants in Turkey and the TRNC!

Moreover, we are at your door with Yemeksepeti Market and Yemeksepeti Mahalle, not only for food orders, but also for all your grocery and daily shopping needs!


Are you hungry?
Choose the restaurant, add the meal to your basket, pay online or at the door as you wish. The rest is easy, your order is at your door quickly!


Need grocery shopping in minutes?

Yemeksepeti Market is at your service! Thousands of market products can be delivered at any time, within minutes!


Do you want your daily needs at your door without leaving your home?

Yemeksepeti Mahalle is also here! All the local shops you know and trust around your neighbourhood, such as supermarkets, delicatessens, greengrocers, butchers, fishmongers and pet shops, are at your door with various campaigns!

Download the app, sign up for free. After choosing your location, order your food, market or daily needs quickly!


What awaits you at Yemeksepeti?

-With Yemeksepeti, your favourite restaurants such as Burger King, McDonald's, KFC, Popeyes, Domino's Pizza, Little Caesars, Pizza Hut, Komagene or the best restaurants in your neighbourhood that you can discover by ranking them according to their scores! Besides, all cuisine options!

-With Yemeksepeti Market and Yemeksepeti Mahalle, tens of categories and thousands of products for your grocery shopping and daily needs!

-Thousands of discounts every day for your food, grocery and daily needs!

-Online or at the door, the option to pay as you wish!

-24/7 Live Support team, always ready to support you with your order!


All you have to do is think about your needs and take a look at the options around you!

Contact Us:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Yemeksepeti 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/yemeksepeti 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/yemeksepeti 
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/yemeksepeti

For all of your queries: info@yemeksepeti.com

Винлаб — супермаркет напитков, продуктов питания и товаров на любой вкус по хорошим ценам, представленный в регионах по всей России. 
В нашем алкомаркете представлен широкий выбор вина любых марок и других видов спиртного разной крепости. Помимо этого, у нас можно найти эксклюзивные алкогольные напитки, которые оценят даже истинные сомелье.



Мобильное приложение Винлаб предоставляет пользователям широкий список услуг
- Удобный онлайн-заказ с проверкой наличия товаров в магазине.
- Резервирование спиртных и безалкогольных напитков круглосуточно.
- Экспресс-заказ в магазин: доступен к выдаче в течение 1 часа.
- Исключительные преимущества карты лояльности WinClub.



Акции, скидки и персональные предложения
В нашем супермаркете регулярно проводятся различные акции и скидки в супермаркетах на алкогольные напитки разной крепости и другие категории напитков. Мы предоставляем постоянные и сезонные скидки, о которых можно узнавать первыми, включив push-уведомления в настройках приложения. Также у нас есть персональные предложения, доступные в личном кабинете в разделе «Акции для меня».



Программа лояльности WinClub
Мы разработали программу лояльности WinClub, которая предоставляет нашим постоянным покупателям привилегии:
Уникальная система скидок, позволяющая копить баллы и оплачивать ими до 100% стоимости покупки.
Возможность каждый месяц выбирать любимые бренды и получать двойные баллы за покупки, чтобы получить максимальное удовольствие от своих любимых напитков!
Карта лояльности — всегда под рукой. Совершайте покупки в наших магазинах и предъявляйте штрихкод на кассе для получения скидки.


Огромный выбор спиртного и других товаров
В нашем супермаркете представлен широкий ассортимент алкогольных и безалкогольных напитков, а также другой продукции, вкусной и полезной для стола. В каталоге можно выделить различные марки вина, шампанское, виски, коньяк, пиво, водку, а также эксклюзивные предложения. 
Для любителей безалкогольной продукции у нас есть достойное предложение соков, питьевой воды, газированных, энергетических и чайных напитков. 



Удобство оформления заказов по интернету
Мы стремимся сделать наше приложение максимально удобным для пользователей, поэтому объединили в нем самые необходимые услуги — включая онлайн-заказ напитков. А с помощью удобных фильтров внутри приложения легко выбрать подходящие товары для любого случая — будь то торжественная церемония, вечеринка на веранде или встреча с друзьями.


Приложение позволяет проверить наличие товаров в выбранном магазине и зарезервировать спиртные или безалкогольные напитки круглосуточно
- Экспресс-заказ: Возможен к выдаче в супермаркете в течение 1 часа после оформления.
- Заказ со склада: Опция для случаев, когда товар отсутствует в выбранном магазине, осуществляется без ограничений по количеству и сумме заказа, ближайшая дата доставки будет указана в личном кабинете.



Оформленный заказ можно оплатить в супермаркете, выбранном для самовывоза, предъявив QR-код на кассе. Ближайший супермаркет легко найти на интерактивной карте с автоматическим построением маршрута.


Все в одном месте!


Главное преимущество приложения — доступность всех опций в одном месте. Помимо доступа к акциям, широкому выбору продукции и возможности онлайн-заказа, в приложении можно проверить историю заказов и добавить любимые товары в избранное. Пользователи могут делиться впечатлениями, оценивая продукцию и совершая правильный выбор благодаря рейтингу и карточкам товаров.




Разделите удовольствие с Винлаб — супермаркет напитков!




Предназначено для лиц старше 18 лет. Данный материал носит исключительно информационный характер и не является рекламой спиртных напитков. Мобильное приложение не предусматривает возможности онлайн-покупки и доставки товаров на дом. Продажа алкогольной продукции осуществляется исключительно в магазине.

developer: Good To Go Foodworks Private Limited
description:
‘Good To Go’’ exactly knows how hard it is to detach yourself from that cushioned couch, traverse through hardships to reach at one of the neighbourhood meat shops, and ogle at the unpleasant process to score a few kilograms of mediocre quality meat.

Be it the juiciest chicken, the freshest catch of seafood or the most tender Lamb, we have the freshest & tender Meats handpicked for you, cut fresh and delivered to you at your doorstep with premium packaging at the most unbelievable prices, and love of course!

Very well rooted in the wholesale market, with a history of bringing food to your tables via the kitchens of some of the finest restaurants & hotels in Delhi-NCR, like the Hyatt, The Oberoi, The Leela, The Shangrila & The Claridges, just to name a few, we are now delivering Meats to more than 10,000 households in Delhi & Gurgaon, since 2015.

With Good To Go you will enjoy
- Free home delivery
- A hassle-free return policy
- Delivery in less than 2 hours
- Easy payment options like Cash on Delivery, Credit / Debit Card and Netbanking

Would you like to get in touch with us?

- http://www.goodtogostore.com
- https://www.facebook.com/goodtogostore
- Customer Service : wecare@goodtogostore.com
- Product Team : info@goodtogostore.com
- Helpline : 9555200600

Food delivery service from grocery stores, cafes and restaurants

You can order both burgers and steaks, as well as products from grocery stores. Free delivery for your first order!

ALL NEARBY GROCERIES AND RESTAURANTS IN ONE APP
Get your groceries delivered from both popular stores and local markets. And for those who don't want to cook, you can find your favorite dishes from cafes and restaurants. In Yandex Eats, you can order a cooked pizza or ingredients for it.

ORDER FAST DELIVERY TO YOUR ADDRESS
Enter the delivery address — we will find the nearest store or restaurant to you and deliver the order as quickly as possible. On average food is delivered in 32 minutes after placing an order — even faster than you would get ready to go shopping.

TRACK YOUR ORDER 
In the app, you can find out the status of the order and the location of the courier.

USE FILTERS TO FIND EVERYTHING YOU NEED
With filters you can find a specific cuisine or dish with one click. “Burgers”, “Sushi”, “Pizza” — Yandex Eats has sets for every occasion.

DISCOUNTS AND SPECIAL OFFERS EVERY DAY 
In the app, you can place an order profitably: for example, get free delivery or a dish as a gift. In the section “Promotions” we collect the best offers from shops and restaurants every day.

Yandex Eats is an information service. Delivery zones, delivery times, and restaurant offers are limited. To learn more, go to eda.yandex. Fast delivery: the average order delivery time is 32 minutes according to data from January 18 to January 25, 2022.

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!

The official Burger King India app is now available for you to place your order, be it for safe and contactless dine-in, takeaway or food delivery. With the App, you can Have It Your Way in a few simple steps, and earn yourself some Crown rewards while you’re at it.

 

Taste, Your Way

We take your Trust in Taste very seriously, which is why with the Burger King App you have access to the freshest additions to the menu.

Want something big, juicy and flame grilled? Want it made Your Way with double patties extra cheese? We got a Whopper for you.

Craving those munchies? We got fries of more than one kind.

Feeling like going back to the classics? We got that irreplaceable taste for you.

Need to shake off those blues? We got some thick shakes to cheer you up.

Order through the App to let the King adapt to your taste, and recommend food items according to your preferences. 

 

Offers, Your Way

The Burger King app is Home to all the exclusive deals on your favourite dishes from the Burger King Menu. Download the app for meal prices like you’ve never seen before!

Use your crown points to redeem further discounts and offers.

 

BK Loyalty Program

The King always rewards loyalty. Earn crowns points on the Burger King app with each order. The more you collect, the greater the reward for you!

Pro tip: Shake your phone once you’ve downloaded the app to earn your crowns before you start filling up your cart.

 

Order Your Way

Wanna eat your Whopper at home in your pyjamas? The App’s got you covered with BK Delivery. Enjoy your freshly flame grilled Whopper brought to you at your doorstep through safe deliveries.

 

Wish to enjoy your meal on-the-go? Have it your way with zero contact ordering and safe takeaways by placing your order on the App. P.S- Do not blame us if you finish most of your Hi-Fries on your way back home.

 

Looking for the full Burger King experience with safe dine-ins while wearing the crown? Use this opportunity to earn some crowns as well on the Burger King app while going contactless in Your Way of ordering at the stores.

 

Finally, the King

Find out more about the Home of the Whopper on Brand Wall and you’ll learn the BK lingo in no time. At Burger King, we like to keep things real & authentic, just like the flavours in our food. Get a sneak peek into the King’s journey and how the Flame Grill came about. Learn what makes the Whopper so Imperfectly Perfect. After all, we take our food (not ourselves) very seriously.

The all new KFC App is the fastest way to order KFC food online. Ordering food and getting kfc food delivery has never been so easy, and within a few steps. Save your favourite order to avoid the hassle of looking and ordering the same items you like

In KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared kentucky fried chicken and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favourite chicken options sitting at home.

Get started and order in minimum steps:
1. Download the app
2. Select the preferred language based on ease.
3. Check your favourite items categorized as part of menu
4. Add items in the cart
5. Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest
6. Select location (Astana, Almaty etc.) and delivery address
7. Proceed to checkout and make payment
8. Track your order and get it delivered at a lightning fast delivery
9. Enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep.

Why you should use KFC App:
- Full KFC Menu: Order from the range of options - KFC Mighty Zinger Box, Twister Combo, Meals, KFC buckets & more! (Can I add items from current menu)

- Re-order KFC orders with ease: You can now re-order any of your previous orders in just a couple of clicks!

- Late night delivery: Late night hunger options. Look no further and simply order food online from KFC & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at 2 AM. This is available at select locations only.

- Hassle-free payments: With multiple payment options (including Credit Cards, Debit Cards etc.) on your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order.

- Special Offers: Get KFC Offers, KFC Coupons & more, customized only for you so that you can order more and get rewarded at times you order.

- Social Login: Why spent time in the login process when it can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook account to login with ease.

- Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help! Call us at - 7797

Shop online & get your groceries delivered directly to your door in as fast as 1 hour. Plus, your first three grocery deliveries are free! And it's safe—contactless delivery is available.

Instacart delivers fresh food, drinks, and household items the same day in cities like Toronto, Vancouver, Kitchener, Ottawa, Mississauga, Brampton, London, and many more. Download the app to see what stores are available in your postal code.

Prefer to pickup? Order online and pickup at your local store, where it will be waiting for you when you arrive.

Ordering made easy
1. Enter your postal code
2. Shop stores for groceries, household items, electronics, and more
3. Add your items to your cart and place your order
4. Chat with your shopper in real time to make any changes to your order
5. Relax as while you wait for your delivery to arrive
6. Enjoy your items while you save time & money

Contactless delivery
Order safely from your home and get your groceries delivered to you same day. Our 100% contactless delivery helps to ensure you and your shopper stay safe.

Find your favourite products
Get fresh produce, late-night snacks, and drinks delivered to your door. Don’t forget essentials like toilet paper, other household items!

And your shopper will ensure that fragile items like eggs and glass bottles are always handled with care.

With Instacart, you can:
• Find exclusive deals & coupons
• Creating shopping lists
• Reorder your favourite products
• View nutritional information & filter by diet

Where to shop with Instacart
Shop from your favourite stores - City Market, Walmart, Costco, and nearly 40,000 other retail locations in North America.

Download to see what stores are available in your postal code.

Terms and conditions apply. See details: https://www.instacart.ca/help/section/360007996832
